articles.author: By Maxine Shen For Dailymail.com
articles.title: Financial information, therapy sessions and nudity among private Zoom call videos found online
articles.description: The revelation comes as millions across the US have flocked to Zoom's video call platform to conduct business amid coronavirus social distancing orders and lockdowns.
articles.content:
A privacy expert found that thousands of personal Zoom videos - containing company financial info, therapy sessions, school children classes and even nudity - were left viewable and searchable by anyone on the internet. 
The revelation comes as millions acro… [+5070 chars]
